newsitem.title: FRANCE: RUGBY UNION-FRENCH PROP CALIFANO TO MISS SCOTLAND MATCH.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-FRENCH PROP CALIFANO TO MISS SCOTLAND MATCH.

text.p: Toulouse prop Christian Califano will not be selected to play for France against Scotland in the Five Nations match in Paris on Saturday because he was sent off during a league game at the weekend.
French selectors said any player sent off in a league match would be automatically suspended for the next international game.
Califano was sent off for punching Grenoble prop Louis Esposito on Sunday. Toulouse won 19-17 at Grenoble.
